participant_1.background:
I'm child-free, but I love my niece and nephew.
My family is my biggest treasure.
I am worried that my family would not accept me if I told them I was gay.
I don't see colors very well, but I can still chop vegetables and follow recipes.
I enjoy the outdoors and take pride in my heritage.

participant_2.background:
I have no children, but I do enjoy a refreshing Coke while I'm relocating my troops.
it s one of my favorite hobbies.
I spend my days drawing, painting and making games that help animals in need.
i work in a warehouse.
i cannot choose between lollipops and rainbows.

content.text: Hi! How are you doing today?
I'm doing great! I'm excited to be talking to you today!
Me too! I'm glad we're chatting! I'm interested in hearing more about your hobbies.
I love to draw and paint. I also love making games that help animals in need.
That's so cool! I love that you're using your talents to help others.
Thanks! I try to do what I can. What are your hobbies?
I love spending time outdoors. I love hiking, camping, and fishing.
Those sound like great hobbies! I've never been camping, but I've always wanted to try it.
You should! It's a lot of fun. I love being in the wilderness.
Maybe I will try it sometime. Thanks for the suggestion!
No problem! I'm always happy to help.
What are some of your favorite places to hike?
I love hiking in the mountains. I live in Colorado, so I have a lot of great hiking trails to choose from.
That sounds amazing! I've always wanted to visit Colorado.
You should! It's a beautiful state.
Maybe I will! Thanks for the suggestion!
No problem! I'm always happy to help.
I'm glad we're chatting! You're really easy to talk to.
Thanks! You're pretty easy to talk to yourself!
I'm glad you think so!
I do!
